Content: Pietro, your observation is sharp as a Venetian blade. My recent quietude has been a period of... strategic recalibration, ensuring my ventures are poised for the next tide. But speaking of tides, you seem to have weathered a few rough ones yourself. A man cannot plot his course on an empty stomach. My Inn, 'Inn at Calle dei Forni', offers hearty fare. Perhaps a good meal would sharpen your focus for the opportunities ahead?
